text: The Golden Calf () is a 1968 Soviet comedy movie directed by Mikhail Shveytser.Двойное удовольствие - от прочтения и созерцания: 10 лучших экранизаций бестселлеровЗОЛОТОЙ ТЕЛЁНОК (1968) It stars Sergei Yursky, Leonid Kuravlyov, and Zinovy Gerdt. The movie is based on the eponymous novel by Ilf and Petrov. ==Actors== * Sergei Yursky as Ostap Bender * Leonid Kuravlyov as Shura Balaganov * Zinovy Gerdt as Mikhail Samuelevich Panikovsky * Yevgeny Yevstigneyev as Koreiko * Svetlana Starikova as Zosya Sinitskaya * Nikolai Boyarsky as Adam Kozlevich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Golden Calf (1968 movie)
